title: Ranked Flex not working - It is still recognizing old ranks
body: Everytime I try to team up with people who were over a division below last season it comes up with the error message that I am too many ranks above to play with them despite the fact both of us are currently unranked. Soloqueue is the only one working. Please help!

replies.body: If you're doing placements, it does take the previous rank into account, but there's also been a slight bug where some haven't been able to queue together for ranked either. Would you mind letting me know who you were trying to queue with so I can double check a few things?
Sure thing. The previous rank wouldn't stop us from queuing together though would it? The person I was trying to queue with is Deadmanwater
Ahaaa so it does look like it's the previous rank holding you two back. The rank your friend had was a little too high to be able to queue with you =(.
Oh okay I just assumed because all the ranks have been reset that we would be able to queue. No problems thanks for the help :)
